member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS.Activate
member.summary: Activates the Xamarin iOS specific support classes
member.exception: Thrown if Couchbase.Lite and Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS do not match

member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS.CheckVersion
member.summary: A sanity check to ensure that the versions of Couchbase.Lite and Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS match. These libraries are not independent and must have the exact same version
member.exception: Thrown if Couchbase.Lite and Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS do not match

member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.iOS.EnableTextLogging
member.summary: [DEPRECATED] Enables text based logging for debugging purposes. Log statements will be written to NSLog
